verses.content: Chun, Fekân Ruoiṭhena ding ni ruk a la umin, Isu mithi laia inthawka a keitho Lazar umna Bethani kha a hung tlung a.
Chun, chutaka chun ama ta dingin zânah ruoi an ṭheh a; Martha chun rawng a bâwl a, Lazar chu a thlaithlêng awtpuitu pakhat a nih.
Chun, Mariin bûk zâtve Spiknard hriek rim inhnik totak a hung chawi a, Isu kehai a nâl a, a samin a kehai chu a hrûk a; chuongchun, chu hriek rim chun in chu a sip rum rum el a.
Nisienlakhawm, Iskariot Juda, a închûktir pakhat, ân mantirtu ding chun,
“Hi hriek rim inhnik hi iengdinga duli za thuma zawra pasiehai kuoma an pêk lem naw am a na?” a ta.
(Pasiehai a ngaisak leia chu thu chu hril a ni nawh; inru a na, tangka ip a kawl a, a sûnga um chu a lâk hlak lei a ni lem a).
Chun, Isûn, “Tosan rawh, an mi phûm nia dingin khêk raw se.
Pasiehai chu kumkhuoin in kuoma um an nih, kei ruok chu kumkhuoa in kuoma um ding ka ni nawh,” a ta.
Chun, Isu chutaka chun a um ti Juda mi narânhai chun an lo hriet tah a; chun, an hung a, Isu chau chu an hungna san a ni nawh a, mithi laia inthawka a keitho Lazar khawm kha hmu dingin a ni bawk a.
Chun, thiempu lalhai chu Lazar khawm sukhlum dingin an inrâwn a;
ama leia Juda tamtakin an pakai san a, Isu an ring hlak leiin.
A zînga chun, ruoiṭhenaa hung mipui tamtakin Isu Jerusalemah a hung ding a nih ti an hrietin,
tûm kauhai an chawi a, a tuok dingin an va suok a, “Hosanna, Lalpa hminga Israel Lal hung chu inpâkin um raw se,” tiin an khêk a.
Chun, Isûn sabengtungtê a hmuh a, a chungah a chuong a,
“Ṭi naw, Zion naunu, En ta, i Lal chu, Sabengtungtê chunga chuongin, A hung ding a nih,” ti ziek ang khan.

Chuong thu chu a tîrin a închûktirhaiin an hriet nawh; nisien- lakhawm, Isu chawimawia a um hnung chun, a chanchinah chuong thu chu ziek a nih ti le, a chungah chuong thil chu an lo thaw ngei ti an hriet tah a.
Chun, Lazar thlâna inthawka a ko suok a, mithi laia inthawka a keitho laia mipui umhai khan, a thu chu an inhriettir ta pei a.
Chu lei chun a nih mipuihai khawmin ama chu an tuok chu; chu thilmak chu a thaw ti an hriet sih a.
Chuongchun, Pharisaihai chun, “Hre ro, iengkhawm in law thei naw hi; en ta u, khawvêlin ama an zui ta hi,” an ta.
Chun, ruoiṭhenaa Pathien chibai bûk dinga hang fehai lai Grik tuhai amanih an um a.
Chuonghai chu Galili rama Bethsaida khuoa mi Philip kuoma chun an hung a, a kuomah, “Pu, Isu hmu kan nuom,” an ta, an ngên a.
Philip chun Andri a hung hril a; Andri le Philip chun Isu an hung hril a.
Chun, Isûn a dawn a, an kuomah, “Mihriem Naupa chawi- mawia a um hun chu a tlung tah.
Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, bu mal hnuoiah a tlah a, a thi naw chun, a mal chauin a um zing hlak; a thi ruok chun tamtakin a ra hlak.
Tûkhawm a hringna thlâkhla chun ân hmang hlak, tûkhawm hi khawvêla hin a hringna ngaitlâwm chun chatuona hringna vawng zing a tih.
Tûkhawmin ka rawng a bâwl chun mi zui raw se; ka umnaah ka rawng bâwltu khawm um a tih. Tûkhawmin ka rawng a bâwl chun ama chu Pain chawimawi a tih.
“Tuhin ka lungril a lunginzîng, ieng am hril ka ta aw? ‘Pa, hi huna inthawk hin mi sanhim rawh,’ ka ti ding am a nih? Ti lo e, hi ding lei taka hi, hi huna hi hung ka nih,
Pa, i hming inchawimawi rawh,” a ta. Chuongchun, vâna inthawkin râwl a hung suok a, “Ka chawimawi tah, chawimawi nâwk bawk ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, mipui a kâwla ngîrhai chun chu chu an hriet a, “Vân ân rûm a nih,” an ta, mi danghaiin, “Vantirkoin ama a biek a nih,” an ta.
Isûn a dawn a, “Chu râwl chu ka ta dinga hung suok a ni nawh, nangni ta dingin a ni lem.
Tuhin hi khawvêl hi ngaituo lai a nih; tuhin hi khawvêl lal hi pei suok nîng a tih.
Chun, kei hnuoia inthawka khaikânga ka um chun, mi po po keia tieng hîp ka tih,” a ta.
Chu thu chu a thizie ding inhriettirna dingin a hril a nih.

Chun, mipui chun a kuomah, “Krista chu chatuonin a um zing ding a nih ti Dân Lekhabuah kan hriet ie, nangin, ‘Mihriem Naupa khaikângin a um ding a nih,’ ieng ti tia ti am i na? Chu Mihriem Naupa chu tu am a na?” an ta, an dawn a.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Var hi nangni lai sâwt nawte a la um hri hi, var in nei sûng hin lêng ro, inthimin a nang nawna ding cheuin; tûkhawm inthima lêng chun a fena chin a hriet ngai nawh.
Var in nei sûng hin var hi ring ro, var nauhai in hung ni theina dingin,” a ta. Chuong thu chu Isûn a hril a, chun, a feh a, an hmu naw dingin ân bihmang a.
An hmaah chuong ang thilmak tamtak thaw sienla khawm ama an ring si nawh:
“Lalpa, kan thu hril tuin am a ring a? Lalpa kut khawm tu kuom âm ân lang a?” ti, Zâwlnei Isaiin a hril kha a tlungna dingin.
Hi lei hin a nih an ring thei naw, Isaiin,

“Amain an mit a sukdel a, An lungril a sukvêt a; Chuong naw chun, an mitin hmu rawi an ta, An lungrilin hre rawi an ta, Ngha kîr nâwk rawi an ta; Keiin anni sukdam rawi ka tih,” ti a hril nâwk lei hin.
Isaiin a ropuizie a hmu le a chanchin a hril lei hin chuong thu chu a hril a nih.
Nisienlakhawm, hotuhai a ṭhen tamtakin Isu an ring tah a; amiruokchu, Pharisaihai leiin an inphuong nawh; chuong naw chun, inkhâwmna in hnawngin um an tih.
Pathien kuoma ropuina nêkin mihriem kuoma ropuina an dit lem sih a.
Chun, Isu a khêk a, “Tûkhawm keia mi ring chu keia mi ring a ni nawh a, a mi tirtu ring a ni lem.
Tûkhawm a mi hmu chu a mi tirtu hmu a nih.
êntua khawvêla hung ka ni hi, tûkhawm a mi ring taphawt inthima an um zing nawna dingin.
Tûkhawm ka thu hril hrein awi naw sienla khawm, keiin thiemnaw kân chang tir nawh; khawvêl thiemnaw inchangtir dinga hung ka ni nawh a; khawvêl sanhim dinga hung ka ni lem.
Tûkhawm mi dit loa, ka thu hrilhai vawn lo chun, thiemnaw inchangtirtu pakhat a nei a nih; ka thu hril kha, kha thu ngei khan ni kin nia chun ama thiemnaw inchangtir a tih.
Keia phuokfâwmin ka hril si nawh; Pa a mi tirtu chun, ka hril ding le ka ṭawngna ding chu thu a mi pêk a ni lem.
Ama thupêk chu chatuona hringna a nih ti ka hriet, chuleichun, thu ka hrilhai hi Pa mi hril ang peiin ka hril a nih,” a ta.
